title: 01/08/21 - HOUR 2 - NFL Playoffs
itunes:title: 01/08/21 - HOUR 2 - NFL Playoffs
description:
In hour 2, the guys discuss the importance of QBs showing up and showing out to make their name in the playoffs. Josh Allen and Buffalo Bills are the favorites amongst the field to have a chance to upset the Kansas City Chiefs. And Urban Meyer will need a strong supporting cast to help him being successful in Jacksonville.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
